commits.message: Add dual payment gateway (Dodo + LemonSqueezy) and fake door validation
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete duplicate Coming Late Squad from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Archive and delete 15 old single-assistant scenarios from Vapi
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add orphaned assistants to Vapi archive and delete from account
commits.author: shalombook

commits.message: Add backup of 6 deleted legacy Vapi assistants
commits.author: shalombook

panels.title: Add dual payment gateway (Dodo + LemonSqueezy)
panels.scene: Two massive gates, one labeled 'Dodo' and the other 'LemonSqueezy,' stand side-by-side, guarding the entrance to the kingdom. Villagers are throwing money into both gates, cheering wildly. The Knight stands in the middle, looking slightly overwhelmed.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: Two payment options! We are truly blessed!

panels.title: Archive and delete duplicate Coming Late Squad
panels.scene: A sad, pathetic-looking creature labeled 'Coming Late Squad' is being led away by guards. Villagers are waving goodbye, some with tears in their eyes. The Knight is calmly marking it off a list.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: The duplicates are gone! But... I'll miss them.

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: It was a cron job that fired twice.

panels.title: Add backup of 6 deleted legacy Vapi assistants
panels.scene: Six spectral figures of wizards float in jars labeled 'Legacy Vapi Assistants' in a giant vault. The Knight is calmly placing the last jar on a shelf. Villagers are peering in from behind a glass window, awestruck.

bubbles.speaker: Knight
bubbles.text: Just in case we need them again.

panels.title: 5 commits. 2 gateways. 22 assistants archived.
panels.scene: The Knight is sitting on a rock, sharpening his sword with a weary expression. Villagers are constructing a giant pyramid in the background dedicated to the archived assistants. One villager is giving a speech.

bubbles.speaker: Villager
bubbles.text: We shall never forget the great Vapi purge!
